attributes.action: Declare June 15th as the English National Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
June 15th, 1215, was the date that King John agreed to the "Articles of the Barons", to which his Great Seal was attached in the meadow at Runnymede and Magna Carta came into being.

Magna Carta is one of the greatest documents created in English history and the date of its signing should replace St. George's Day as the Engish National Day.

A document that was to reverberate throughout history for centuries influencing the Founding Fathers of America, the Universal Declaration of Human Rights, the founding of Habeus Corpus, the limitation of the powers of the executive, the enshrining of the freedom of the Church, trial by jury, the pre-eminence of property rights, promotion on merit and the prohibition of bribery.

A day that English folk can feel truly proud of their country.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stgeorgeevents/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
